dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
FreeCAD is an open-source parametric 3D modeler made primarily to design
real-life objects of any size. Parametric modeling allows you to easily
modify your design by going back into your model history to change its
parameters.
dependent_to.name: freecad

dependent_to.description: A python package with helper tools for the nf-core community.
dependent_to.name: nf-core-tools

dependent_to.description:
AlpacaFarm is a simulator that enables research and development on
learning from feedback at a fraction of the usual cost, promoting
accessible research on instruction following and alignment.
dependent_to.name: py-alpaca-farm

dependent_to.description: Cheetah3 is a template engine and code generation tool.
dependent_to.name: py-cheetah3

dependent_to.description:
FORD, standing for FORtran Documenter, is an automatic documentation
generator for modern Fortran programs.
dependent_to.name: py-ford

dependent_to.description:
This is an extension to Python-Markdown which provides an "include"
function, similar to that found in LaTeX (and also the C pre-processor
and Fortran).
dependent_to.name: py-markdown-include

dependent_to.description:
This is an extension to Python-Markdown which allows environment
variables to be used in the text.
dependent_to.name: py-md-environ

dependent_to.description:
MkDocs is a fast, simple and downright gorgeous static site generator
that's geared towards building project documentation.
dependent_to.name: py-mkdocs

dependent_to.description: Automatically link across pages in MkDocs.
dependent_to.name: py-mkdocs-autorefs

dependent_to.description:
Write your documentation in Markdown and create a professional static
site for your Open Source or commercial project in minutes.
dependent_to.name: py-mkdocs-material

dependent_to.description: Automatic documentation from sources, for MkDocs.
dependent_to.name: py-mkdocstrings

dependent_to.description: MLflow: A Platform for ML Development and Productionization.
dependent_to.name: py-mlflow

dependent_to.description:
Create a source of truth for ML model results and browse it on Papers
with Code
dependent_to.name: py-model-index

dependent_to.description:
MultiQC is a tool to aggregate bioinformatics results across many
samples into a single report. It is written in Python and contains
modules for a large number of common bioinformatics tools.
dependent_to.name: py-multiqc

dependent_to.description: A high level app and dashboarding solution for Python.
dependent_to.name: py-panel

dependent_to.description: Auto-generate API documentation for Python projects.
dependent_to.name: py-pdoc3

dependent_to.description: Extensions for Python Markdown.
dependent_to.name: py-pymdown-extensions

dependent_to.description: Math extension for Python-Markdown
dependent_to.name: py-python-markdown-math

dependent_to.description: Simplified packaging for pybind11-based C++ extensions
dependent_to.name: py-setuptools-cpp

dependent_to.description:
TensorBoard is a suite of web applications for inspecting and
understanding your TensorFlow runs and graphs.
dependent_to.name: py-tensorboard

description:
This is a Python implementation of John Gruber's Markdown. It is almost
completely compliant with the reference implementation, though there are
a few very minor differences. See John's Syntax Documentation for the
syntax rules.
name: py-markdown

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
